summary.name: Name
summary.confirm_box: I hereby confirm that the information above is true, complete and accurate.
summary.final_p1: The installation of the batterX traX was successfully completed and an e-mail with a confirmation link was sent to the customer.
summary.final_p2: By clicking the confirmation link the customer can start using the batterX Portal for remote monitoring of his batterX traX.
summary.final_p3: As the installer of the system you get access to this batterX traX from your own account as well.
summary.final_p6: The batterX Portal can be found at the following link
